entry.title: Chapter 2; The Second Knight
entry.summary:
Author: Corvix_Ailuranthrope_4313

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,401Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Bruce Wayne is many things, he was the protector of Gotham, an orphan, a father and a hero, but the worst thing that he could be, was old, with his allies spread out or gone, he decided to initiate Safeguard 27, an ambitious project that would provide Gotham an eternal protector, but would the protector be ready or even willing to protect his home? Only time and faith would tell for the future of Batman.

entry.title: These Are the Days Returned
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,545Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 218

Summary: Bruce wakes up in a Gotham that isn’t his own—younger, unscarred, in a world where Batman never existed. He is surrounded by children who still found their way into vigilantism without his intervention, who look at him with affection and wariness in equal measure.They believe he’s their Bruce, recovering from a brutal attack, but he knows he isn’t. But as he plays along, trying to piece together the secrets of this world and the reason for his presence here, staying silent may prove just as dangerous—because whoever wanted this world’s Bruce Wayne dead isn’t finished yet.

entry.title: other world of Bats: the one that most confuse.
entry.summary:
Author: Noir_Nolan_NO1

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,834Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 43

Summary: Each chapter can be read as a one short, since I don't like to interrupt each events. When Clark Kent was preparing to enjoy a little break week from superhero, he didn’t prepare things quickly became a fight against the invaders outside the city, with other superheroes. Now he have new teammates, new friends. Right after just being call ‘lonely man’ by his two friends. And finally, he could have a more chance become friend with other fellas, learned more about the world around an—is that a huge bat ??? I'm not good at writing introductions LOL.—————Alternative short: Bruce now knows how to do magic but still chose becomes a scary Batman so that people don't realize he is just have a normal human body. Kidna—Adopt some Batkids and become Gotham's favorite batfamily, when also separate from other heroes outside world. Eventually result of the Justice League and outside thinking they are just inhuman beings—and wild. The battling were evilly planning.the world was curious.And Gotham just stood by and watched this burn. People don't even realize how Superman changes when the bat often appears near him.

entry.title: Why Can't Anything Be Simple?
entry.summary:
Author: Megamagic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,953Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 170

Summary: Green Lantern and Batman are sent to another planet to try to stop a war that would consume a vast part of the galaxy.However in the middle of the mission the planet is attacked by a power hungry species who thrive on war. To protect the lives of everyone on the planet Batman surrenders himself to the leader of the species. Who is fascinated by making the man his pet. The Justice League rush to rescue their teammate but are met with many road blocks along the way. (Be aware this is a WIP and the tags are not updated fully. This is going to be a dark one so please re-check tags with every new chapter I post.)

entry.title: I think I've seen this love before
entry.summary:
Author: dickweed7

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,814Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 57

Summary: Bruce Wayne took pride in his children. Despite only one being his biological child, he loved them all equally. And despite how much they asked, he did not have a favorite. Not that anyone would ever admit it—they were all too stubborn, too smart, too chaotic to let him get away with playing favorites. It wasn’t easy. Some of them called him “Dad” without hesitation, others stumbled over the word, as if daring him to be more human than he’d been trained to be. Some had no words at all, only gestures, glances, or unspoken needs. And yet, every single one of them left an impression he couldn’t shake, a mark that Thomas and Martha Wayne had left on him too. He thought about it sometimes, bitterly or fondly depending on the day: how his parents had set an example he couldn’t follow, how their absence shaped him, and how these kids—these impossible, infuriating, brilliant kids—forced him to be the father they needed. -or, the first time each of the Batfamily call Bruce "dad" and the first time he calls them his kids

entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,636Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 222

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.

entry.title: He Don’t Want To Be Saved, Don’t Save Him
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,380Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 22

Summary: A serial killer is on the loose in Gotham, and since the press is all over Bruce, it’s harder for him to investigate. When then BAU get a call from the Gotham City Police asking for help, they are more than happy to fly down and help out. Catching a serial killer while all eyes are on him may be hard, but maybe Bruce can put his mind on something else, more like someone else. Preferably the cute FBI agent that has Brucie and the dark knight coming out as one. Bruce is completely lost, and he doesn’t want to be found. Or, a Case Fic with a new ship.

entry.title: Silicon Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: Jigglepanda

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,230Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 10

Summary: Tim Drake was created to obey. A second-generation android with the mind of a child, he existed to serve his creators—but when Drake Industries demanded theft, moral compromise, and silence, Tim made a choice.Watching Gotham from afar, he became fascinated by the Dark Knight and his protégés, studying every movement, every shadow, every rooftop flip. And when the paths of two extraordinary “sons” collided—Damian, the android Robin, and Tim, the AI—he found more than inspiration. He found family.In the shadows of Gotham, Tim must navigate loyalty, morality, and what it truly means to belong.

entry.title: Secrets That Bind the Soul
entry.summary:
Author: Ellalitious

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,158Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne exist on a different plane, two different worlds. What was supposed to be an interview turned into more. A shared drink, stolen kiss and misshapen hook-up that caused those two planets to collide and almost take the rest of the solar system with them. Superman and Batman have been coworkers and friends for a long time now. Superman realizes he has to face his feelings when suddenly he's entangled with Bruce Wayne. He finds himself falling for the man while his heart remains on Batman, and he's not really sure if he can choose. He sees the other man's walls crumbling ever so slightly, and feels his own falling with them.

entry.title: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only an amateur mage can turn your father into one.
entry.summary:
Author: Mildbedframe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,197Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 126

Summary: “B-man? Is that you?" the vigilante asked, walking slowly towards the dog with his hands raised in the air. The dog barked as he kept staring at his first son. "Bark three times if it's you," ordered Dick. The dog barked three times. "Raise your left paw if it's really you," his son told him. The dog raised his left paw. "Do a d-" the vigilantes started. The dog barked at him with the same tone and look Bruce would use when he scolded one of his children. "Geez, okay. I'm sorry! No need to bark at me." Nightwing said as he petted Bruce's head. Or Bruce gets turned into a dog.
